alert.note: Alert for Door (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 4:49AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...LIGHT TO MODERATE SNOW EXPECTED for THE MORNING COMMUTE TO WORK OR SCHOOL... Light snow continued across northeast Wisconsin early this morning, including all of Door County. The latest radar images indicated a circulation over Lake Michigan moved onshore eastern Door County, between Whitefish Bay and Baileys Harbor. Snowfall rates with this feature may be as high as 1 to 2 inches per hour resulting in locally higher snowfall amounts. The light snow should come to an end by late morning. Any untreated surfaces will be snow covered and slippery. If you encounter untreated roads or bridges, slow down and allow extra distance between you and the car in front of you. Allow a little extra time for your morning commute to work or school.
